com.datastax.driver.core

Class CodecUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datastax.driver.core.CodecUtils

  • public final class CodecUtils
extends Object
    A set of utility methods to deal with type conversion and serialization.

    • Method Detail

      • pack

        public static ByteBuffer pack(ByteBuffer[] buffers,
                              int elements,
                              ProtocolVersion version)
        Utility method that "packs" together a list of ByteBuffers containing serialized collection elements. Mainly intended for use with collection codecs when serializing collections.
        Parameters:
        buffers - the collection elements
        elements - the total number of elements
        version - the protocol version to use
        Returns:
        The serialized collection

      • readSize

        public static int readSize(ByteBuffer input,
                           ProtocolVersion version)
        Utility method that reads a size value. Mainly intended for collection codecs when deserializing CQL collections.
        Parameters:
        input - The ByteBuffer to read from.
        version - The protocol version to use.
        Returns:
        The size value.

      • writeSize

        public static void writeSize(ByteBuffer output,
                             int size,
                             ProtocolVersion version)
        Utility method that writes a size value. Mainly intended for collection codecs when serializing CQL collections.
        Parameters:
        output - The ByteBuffer to write to.
        size - The collection size.
        version - The protocol version to use.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • fromUnsignedToSignedInt

        public static int fromUnsignedToSignedInt(int unsigned)
        Converts an "unsigned" int read from a DATE value into a signed int.

        The protocol encodes DATE values as unsigned ints with the Epoch in the middle of the range (2^31). This method handles the conversion from an "unsigned" to a signed int.

      • fromSignedToUnsignedInt

        public static int fromSignedToUnsignedInt(int signed)
        Converts an int into an "unsigned" int suitable to be written as a DATE value.

        The protocol encodes DATE values as unsigned ints with the Epoch in the middle of the range (2^31). This method handles the conversion from a signed to an "unsigned" int.

      • fromCqlDateToDaysSinceEpoch

        public static int fromCqlDateToDaysSinceEpoch(long raw)
        Convert from a raw CQL long representing a numeric DATE literal to the number of days since the Epoch. In CQL, numeric DATE literals are longs (unsigned integers actually) between 0 and 2^32 - 1, with the epoch in the middle; this method re-centers the epoch at 0.
        Parameters:
        raw - The CQL date value to convert.
        Returns:
        The number of days since the Epoch corresponding to the given raw value.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the value is out of range.

      • fromDaysSinceEpochToCqlDate

        public static long fromDaysSinceEpochToCqlDate(int days)
        Convert the number of days since the Epoch into a raw CQL long representing a numeric DATE literal.

        In CQL, numeric DATE literals are longs (unsigned integers actually) between 0 and 2^32 - 1, with the epoch in the middle; this method re-centers the epoch at 2^31.

        Parameters:
        days - The number of days since the Epoch convert.
        Returns:
        The CQL date value corresponding to the given value.
